wikipedia_page.main: Alan Victor Nelmes (born 20 October 1948 in Hackney, London) is an English retired professional footballer who made over 300 appearances as a defender in the Football League for Brentford. He was inducted into the club's Hall of Fame in November 2014.

response: * Alan Nelmes – Made more than 300 appearances for Brentford as a defender and was inducted into the club's Hall of Fame in 2014.
* Alan Nelmes – first Chelsea, then Brentford.
